title: 'Unfathomable': How this stunning Luka Doncic-Anthony Davis trade came together
description: The most shocking trade in NBA history began with a secret meeting in a coffee shop in Dallas -- and was fueled by a 20-year history with Kobe Bryant.
author: Ramona Shelburne and Tim MacMahon

title: Goodell: NFL 'better' because of diversity efforts
description: NFL commissioner Roger Goodell said he doesn't believe the NFL's policies to promote diversity are in conflict with the Trump administration's efforts to ban diversity, equity and inclusion programs in the federal government.
author: Kalyn Kahler

title: Gonzalez takes Man City's spend to £180m - how they dominated window
description: Manchester City complete the signing of Porto midfielder Nico Gonzalez for 60m euros (£50m).

title: 'A brutal reality for Man Utd' - McNulty's deadline day verdict
description: As the winter transfer window closes, BBC Sport's chief football writer Phil McNulty gives his verdict.

title: Spurs set to sign Tel on loan with £45m option to buy
description: Bayern Munich forward Mathys Tel has landed in England ahead of a proposed loan move to Tottenham that could become permanent.

title: Rashford exit & no forward signed | Was Amorim's first window a success?
description: Ruben Amorim's first transfer window in charge of Manchester United has come to an end and his squad is seemingly no better than the one he inherited.

title: 8 winners, and 5 losers, from the Lakers' big Luka splash
description: The Sunday morning shock has mostly worn off by this point, so it's time to look at the stunning Luka Dončić-for-Anthony Davis trade from all the relevant angles.

title: Cooper Kupp said the Rams are working to trade him immediately: 'I don't agree with the decision'
description: Cooper Kupp has spent his entire career with the Rams.
